titles: The true and vvonderfull history of Perkin VVarbeck, proclaiming himselfe Richard the fourth
author: Gainsford, Thomas, d. 1624?
publisher: Printed by E[dward] G[riffin] for Nathaniel Butter, and are to bee sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Pyde-Bull,
notes: Running title reads: The history of Perkin Warbeck.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
